post:
Hello from Ready2Frag! We are a relatively new but dedicated provider in the gaming, VPS, and dedicated server industry. We operate under a DBA of HostVenom, LLC. in New York, and colocate our hardware in the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility in Chicago, IL.

**Our Offer**

* KVM VPS // SolusVM Control Panel
* 512MB Dedicated RAM
* 1 CPU Core @ 3.30GHz
* 7GB Pure SSD (RAID-10) Space
* 1Gbps Shared Network Port
* 500GB Monthly BW
* 4Gbps / 4MPPS DDoS Protection
* 1 IPv4 Address (Extra IPv4 for $2 / month)
* 16 IPv6 Addresses
* Located in Chicago, IL.

No, we are not a ColoCrossing reseller. We own and operate our own hardware as well as IP space.

**$6 / month (512MB RAM)**

[**ORDER NOW >>**](https://billing.ready2frag.com/cart.php?gid=9)

**Our Hardware**

* Intel Xeon E3-1230v2
* 32GB DDR3 ECC RAM
* 4x 250GB Samsung 840 Evo SSDs
* LSI MegaRAID 9271-4i (RAID-10)
* 1Gbps Network Port

**Our Network**

* DDoS Protected: Up to 4Gbps/4MPPS
* Inbound Data: [GigeNET Blend](http://bgp.he.net/AS32181)
* Outbound Data: [Steadfast Blend](http://bgp.he.net/AS32748)

**Please consult our legal documents before ordering.**

* [Terms of Service](http://ready2frag.com/tos)
* [Acceptable Usage Policy](http://ready2frag.com/aup)
* [Service Level Agreement](http://ready2frag.com/sla)

**Have any questions for us?**

* [Chat with us on livechat!](http://ready2frag.com/)
* [Open a sales ticket!](https://billing.ready2frag.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2)
